Omg I totally agree.  I think any kind of fertility or surrogacy should be completely legal and I understand that sometimes people just want a bio kid, I just hate when people don‚Äôt even consider adopt for the reason of not wanting a child that‚Äôs ‚Äúnot really theirs‚Äù.  Also I guess I forget that in the U.S. there‚Äôs more direct adoptions from the parents instead of going straight to orphanages (I was adopted from China)

I wish more people could see how worth it adoption is.  It makes a huge difference to the kids and also when you help them young they can start therapy and health treatment sooner instead of having to suffer longer

I just hate that people think that because they‚Äôre supposedly getting a healthy bio kid it means there won‚Äôt be any issues growing up.  It‚Äôs like they think that a ‚Äúclean slate‚Äù means they can control having a perfect life when that‚Äôs literally never guaranteed for anyone so like I kinda feel like if they‚Äôre not ready to handle issues in an adopted child then how are they going to hand the issues with their own?
